participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, Jake is deeply connected to his rural roots and enjoys a simple, fulfilling life.
participant_1.background: i work my parents farms. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i'm an electrician.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and outgoing, Sophie thrives in the world of music production and loves to explore new culinary experiences.
participant_2.background: my pets name is charlie. i produce music for artists. my favourite food is pizza. i drive a 2015 honda civic.
